description:
Shadow The Hedgehog (also known as Shadow 05) allows the player to play through 23 stages
with the ultimate lifeform, tracking down the answers to his past.
But this time, it seems the past makes even less sense as nothing appears to be what it seems!
Help Shadow find the truth and put a stop the his cursed past from coming back to haunt him!

ShadowRelease0.2.6.description:
Level Guide:  https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AhW4_tbdYi1otHE17zuGV4dDjaR6xaNDB6nT8rVNY0o/edit?usp=sharing
Poptracker:      PENDING FUTURE RELEASE (Universal Tracker will work)
Setup Guide:	https://github.com/choatix/Archipelago/blob/Shadow-0.2/worlds/shadow_the_hedgehog/docs/setup_en.md
Readme:		https://github.com/choatix/Archipelago/blob/Shadow-0.2/worlds/shadow_the_hedgehog/docs/en_Shadow%20The%20Hedgehog.md


**Key Changes Between 0.1.5 and 0.2.6**

**Objective Sanity Behaviour**
Allows more flexibility in how the game is played.

**Individual enemy/per sanity**
A smoother system, detecting individual objectivesanity images and enemies for stages. Due to technical constraints, this does not apply to Final Haunt Shields or Central City Little Bombs.


**Working Vehicle Logic**
Vehicles will now despawn when you do not have the multiworld item.

**Object despawns**
New checks and options for stage objects to be despawned: Pulleys, Light Dash Trails, Warp Holes, Rockets, Ziplines, Heal Units, Bombs.

**New Checks**
Added checks for Shadow Boxes, Key Doors, Gold Beetles (separate from enemy-sanity) and Energy Cores. 

**Improved Logic Levels**
- Added more handling for hard logic
- Easy logic still requires more work, please inform for any changes you think are needed for easy mode
- Chaos Control Logic added as extension of hard logic


**Generation Stability**
- Much better stability when generating games.
- Handling for starting with items if not enough locations in the pool

**Flexibility**
As part of generation stability, add changes for randomness options.
- Change available percentage to be on top of requirement as additive
- Add options to remove difficult enemy checks
- Weapon duplicates in pool
- Option to start with relevant stage progression items


**Known Issues**
Due to the overall, Reloaded is not expected to work with this version. Future versions will rectify this, please note which things work/do not work if you wish to test this but do not play this is a multiworld.

Many General bug fixes
ShadowRelease0.2.6.title: Shadow Archipelago 0.2.6

shadow-0.2.7.title: V0.2.7

shadow-0.3.2.description:
Fix fuzzing related issues.
Fix issues with select percentage and levels being left unavailable due to various conditions with bosses or non-shuffled story locks.
Fix issues with some gate conditions.
Fix Ammo Boosts so they are actually added to the multiworld.
Disable gates being generated and used when story is disabled.


Fix issues with re-generation when connecting with Universal Tracker.
shadow-0.3.2.title: Shadow V0.3.2

shadow-0.3.3.description: Resolve issue with goaling location accessibility due to gate functionality.
shadow-0.3.3.title: Shadow V0.3.3

shadow-0.4.0.description:
New Features:

**Checkpoint Sanity**
Starting checkpoints for stages as well as checkpoint items included in the pool, allowing you to warp over to them.

**Checkpoint Convenience**
Once a checkpoint has been triggered and the check given, you can always warp to that checkpoint even after leaving the stage.

**Logic Rewrite**
Rewrite the logic for checkpoint sanity, fixing tons of items and enemies in the wrong regions, while adding support for which enemies hold which weapons, and specific accessibility of weapon boxes.


Known Issues:
 - Count up not safely supported yet. This is because I still need to write logic for escaping areas with an escape back to a checkpoint, as well as the maximum in this set.
 -  Craft logic will be somewhat messy.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/choatix/Archipelago/compare/shadow-0.3.3...shadow-0.4.0
shadow-0.4.0.title: Shadow Archipelago v0.4.0

shadow-0.4.1.description:
New Features:

Checkpoint Sanity
Starting checkpoints for stages as well as checkpoint items included in the pool, allowing you to warp over to them.

Checkpoint Convenience
Once a checkpoint has been triggered and the check given, you can always warp to that checkpoint even after leaving the stage.

Logic Rewrite
Rewrite the logic for checkpoint sanity, fixing tons of items and enemies in the wrong regions, while adding support for which enemies hold which weapons, and specific accessibility of weapon boxes.

Last Way Early
Last Way can be included earlier, and you will be booted out of Devil Doom without the required items.

Fixes Since 0.4.0:
Fix issues with last way enabled in various modes of unlock.
Fix story shuffle related issues with other settings.
Replace code for removing excessive copies of extra objective items via available when check counts are lower.
Resolve issues with last way handling when check counts are affected and items are disabled.
Add isCCIntermediate modifier to fix regional issue.
Fix logic inconsistency with floor and environment weapons listed as stage objects.
Fix issues with chaos control gates.
Fix base key regions not working.
Improve version error message.
Fix printed message for unavailable weapon when rule not applicable.


Known Issues:

    Count up not safely supported yet. This is because I still need to write logic for escaping areas with an escape back to a checkpoint, as well as the maximum in this set.
    Craft logic will be somewhat messy.
 Chaos Control logic does not work correctly.
shadow-0.4.1.title: Shadow Archipelago v0.4.1

shadow-0.4.2.description:
**Checkpoint Sanity**
Starting checkpoints for stages as well as checkpoint items included in the pool, allowing you to warp over to them.

**Checkpoint Convenience**
Once a checkpoint has been triggered and the check given, you can always warp to that checkpoint even after leaving the stage.

**Logic Rewrite**
Rewrite the logic for checkpoint sanity, fixing tons of items and enemies in the wrong regions, while adding support for which enemies hold which weapons, and specific accessibility of weapon boxes.

**Last Way Early**
Last Way can be included earlier, and you will be booted out of Devil Doom without the required items.

**Fixes Since 0.4.1:**
Count up logic implemented with escape logic. This also applies to manual clear mode.
Various fixes to level regions and accessibility rules.

**Known Issues:**
- Craft logic may lead to difficult scenarios.
- Chaos Control logic remains cross-route and may not work well with checkpoint behaviour or other crossings.
shadow-0.4.2.title: Shadow Archipelago v0.4.2

shadow0.3.0r2.description:
Level Guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AhW4_tbdYi1otHE17zuGV4dDjaR6xaNDB6nT8rVNY0o/edit?usp=sharing
Setup Guide: https://github.com/choatix/Archipelago/blob/Shadow-0.2/worlds/shadow_the_hedgehog/docs/setup_en.md
Readme: https://github.com/choatix/Archipelago/blob/shadow/worlds/shadow_the_hedgehog/docs/en_Shadow%20The%20Hedgehog.md


### **Major New Features**
**Select Gates**
Allowing unlocking levels in blocks rather than individually
Options available for different requirements.

**Add traps**
3 available at this time, Poison, Ammo & Checkpoint

**Capsule Sanity for all stages**

**Key handling options added**
Now available as archipelago items and requirement of how many, as well as combined option
shadow0.3.0r2.title: v0.3.0
